Comment: Nevada has 4 representatives and 2 senators. Both senators are Democrats, and 3 out of 4 representatives are Democrats.  The single Republican Congress member, Mark Amodei, representing Northern Nevada (Reno, Sparks, Carson City), amended Trump's "big beautiful bill" to sell off 10,000 acres of land in Clark County (represented by the 3 Democratic senators, not by Mark Amodei).  When questioned in committee, he lied that the other 3 representatives knew about this. Later, when asked if they supported it, he said no.  The worst part about this is that the funding bill *circumvents federal law* that requires the money to go to Nevada. Instead, the money from selling 10,000 acres of land goes to the United States Treasury, where it will pay for the billionaire tax cuts included in this bill.  The part of Nevada being completely fucked by this bill isn't even represented by Republicans, nor does it vote for Republicans.
